department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: 3 small abstracted standing figures formed with feather fragments in pink, yellow, brown, green, blue and white; mounted inside a plexi case
markings: \'R86-310\', on red circular sticker, UL corner of case; Merrin Gallery sticker, on stretcher frame; \'R86-310\', in blue ink, on sticker at LL corner
title: Group of three featherwork figures
